title: varus q bug
body: this has happened about 5 times to me the past week, as dark star varus ( i dont know if its cause of the skin) i am to throw my q max range and the animation of it hitting an enemy champion goes off when struck a champion at the end distance, but they take no damage

replies.body:
Hey there,

I asked around and this seems to be a known issue.

[A fix is ready to be released however and should drop sometime next patch.](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4utdvj/varus_q_doesnt_deal_dmg_at_max_range/d5spqs7)
